text:
Symaps.io | Full stack | Paris, France | Full Time | Onsite | Compensation based on profile | VISA Symaps.io is a fast-growing tech startup located in Paris, Station F : it's an AI application that finds the best location for your business (restaurants, stores, etc.), based on profitability. It's currently used by clients in the EU, Switzerland, Korea and Taiwan, incl. Tesla and DÃ©cathlon. We just closed a 700K seed round and several clients contracts, and are urgently looking for passionated peoples to strengthen our team of 6 peoples (incl. 3 full time engineers).

Esp. we're hiring 2 full stack engineers. Our stack : Python, React, Scikit-learn, Kubernetes, Elastic, PostgreSQL / PostGIS.

More details here :

https://jobs.stationf.co/companies/symaps-io-1
